Home » 36P1 Dhammānuloma (1), Tikapaṭṭhānapāḷi (1) » 3 Vedanāttika » 3.7 Pañhāvāra » 3.7.4 Paccayapaccanīyānuloma » Nahetuduka
Catuvīsaka (saupanissaya)
Vedanāttika
Pañhāvāra
Paccayapaccanīyānuloma
Nahetuduka
Catuvīsaka (saupanissaya)
2030Nahetupaccayā naārammaṇapaccayā…pe…  naupanissayapaccayā napurejātapaccayā napacchājātapaccayā naāsevanapaccayā navipākapaccayā naāhārapaccayā naindriyapaccayā najhānapaccayā namaggapaccayā nasampayuttapaccayā navippayuttapaccayā noatthipaccayā nonatthipaccayā novigatapaccayā noavigatapaccayā kamme aṭṭha.
